channel.title: IATI Data Access Needs Consultancy (20 days)
channel.description:
Hello, sharing below opportunity for a short piece of work on data access. Please take a look quickly and keep in mind the short deadline for applying. Thanks!
https://jobs.undp.org/cj_view_job.cfm?cur_job_id=94440

item.title: IATI Data Access Needs Consultancy (20 days)
item.dc:creator: stevieflow
item.description:
Thanks @aparr

That’s a very short turnaround, in terms of advertisement of the opportunity, and anticipated start date. It’s surprising to see this, without some prior notice

Thanks

Read full topic
item.source: IATI Data Access Needs Consultancy (20 days)
